name: publish.webmaker.org
description: A server to save and publish makes/projects created on Thimble and X-ray Goggles

scripts.test: rm dev.db && npm run db && lab -t 100 -c --verbose --colors --assert code --timeout 5000 && npm run lint
scripts.lint: npm run jshint && npm run jscs
scripts.jshint: jshint -c node_modules/mofo-style/linters/.jshintrc api authentication migrations seeds logger.js server.js
scripts.jscs: jscs -c node_modules/mofo-style/linters/.jscsrc api authentication migrations seeds logger.js server.js
